name: Devil in the Details
description:
A visual novel game following a young man after he is mugged and makes a deal with a succubus demon to stay alive.

Now he must do her bidding, finding and exorcising demons on the mortal realm in a multi-ending story game where your choices affect the outcome.Features
  • A multi-routed visual novel
  • A cute and sexy art style
  • Multiple romantic options
  • Multiple endings based on your choices
  • Secrets to uncover and enjoy
  • Steam Achievements
